title: Netball: the Australian way
creator_credit: All Australian Netball Association and Production Group
brief_description: This film provides a comprehensive guide to netball and is directed at teachers, student teachers and coaches giving practical advice on skills and training. The need for a coach to have a caring attitude towards the player is stressed throughout. Topics include: the game; successful coaching; coaching and learning skills; basic skills; skills practices; tactics; strategies and matchplay and planning a training program.
